mapper.sql: u.id as id , u.disabled as disabled , u.uuid as uuid , u.create_user as createUser , u.create_time as createTime , u.update_user as updateUser , u.update_time as updateTime , u.remark as remark , u.order_by as orderBy , u.username as username , u.user_img as userImg , u.password as password , u.sex as sex , u.birthday as birthday , u.user_from as userFrom , u.telephone as telephone , u.email as email , u.nick_name as nickName , u.open_id as openId
mapper.select:
select
from FAT_CUSTOMER u where u.disabled = 0
select count(u.id) from FAT_CUSTOMER u where u.disabled = 0

select count(u.id) from FAT_CUSTOMER u where u.disabled = 0
AND ${whereSqlStr}

select
from FAT_CUSTOMER u where u.disabled = 0 and u.ID = #{id,jdbcType=NUMERIC}

select
from FAT_CUSTOMER u where u.disabled = 0 and u.uuid = #{uuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select
from FAT_CUSTOMER u where u.disabled = 0
mapper.insert: insert into FAT_CUSTOMER( disabled, uuid, create_user, create_time, update_user, update_time, remark, order_by, username, user_img, password, sex, birthday, user_from, telephone, email, nick_name, open_id )values( #{disabled,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{uuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createUser,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateUser,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orderBy,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userImg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sex,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{birthday,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{userFrom,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{telephone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{nickName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{openId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )

insert into FAT_CUSTOMER( disabled, uuid, create_user, create_time, update_user, update_time, remark, order_by, username, user_img, password, sex, birthday, user_from, telephone, email, nick_name, open_id )values
( #{obj.disabled,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{obj.uuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{obj.createUser,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{obj.createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{obj.updateUser,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{obj.updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{obj.remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{obj.orderBy,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{obj.username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{obj.userImg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{obj.password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{obj.sex,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{obj.birthday,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{obj.userFrom,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{obj.telephone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{obj.email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{obj.nickName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{obj.openId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
